CodeExample.Title: Call the Post/Forward action
CodeExample.Summary: To call the Post/Forward action,submit a POST request of the following REST call syntax.
CodeExample.Request:
POST /<version>/myOrganization/users/<User.objectId>/Messages/<Message.Id>/Forward HTTP/1.1 Host : graph.microsoft.com Authorization : Bearer <access_token> Accept : application/json;odata=verbose Content-Length : <body_length>
{ Comment : <Edm.String>, ToRecipients : <Microsoft.Graph.Recipient>, Comment : <Edm.String>, ToRecipients : <Microsoft.Graph.Recipient> }

Remarks.string: A successful call to the Post/Forward action returns an empty response.
